name: Stone Dream Simulator
description:
From boulder to gravel, live the epic life of a rock! 

For 12 days, watch the world change slowly around you as you erode over time.. At night, the stone dreams of flying fish and raining feathers... a surreal set up of everything seen during the day. Choose carefully what you look at as your dreams will be made of it. 

Each day features unique events and environments. Contemplate the cycle of life, as  oceans slowly become deserts...

Controls

Use right and left arrows to look around during the day. Contemplate your dream at night. 

Credits

A dream simulator by Tatiana Vilela dos Santos & Olivier Drouet
Music by Hector Bonte

Made in few days for the Stoner Jam : https://itch.io/jam/stonergamesMore info on http://mechbird.fr/stonedreamsimulator 


Weave your dreams carefully!
